blogData.title: Extra! Extra! Read all about it!
blogData.description:
There's a lot of exciting developments at VideoTranslator, which means
  exciting things for you! So you'll be hearing more from us
blogData.keywords: email, english dialects, free trial, free, translate, open captions, newsletter, updates, update, AI, artificial intelligence, weekly email, mailing list, sign up, youtube subtitles, video caption, youtube captions

data.richContent:
There’s a lot of exciting developments at VideoTranslator, which means exciting things for you! This means that you’ll be hearing more from us going forward in the form of a weekly email.

If you haven’t subscribed to our mailing list or signed up for a free trial yet, please do so here.

The email will be featuring the latest articles we’ve posted which will be like the following:

  • What English Dialects are Available?
  • Where are we heading with AI computing in the 2020s? And how human can they really become?
  • Open Captions: Enhancements November 2019

So you’ll be the first to know about all things VideoTranslator as they happen and never be out of the loop.

We’re looking forward to a lot of great progress this year and can’t wait to share it with you!

Conclusion

If you are interested in trying out our technology, please try our platform or drop us an email at hello@videotranslator.ai.

Please connect with us on LinkedIn, YouTube or Facebook for any comments, questions, or just to keep up to date with the work we do!
